name.baseName: Rare Earth extraction;Rare Earth;Molten Salt Electrolysis;NdFeB Magnet Scrap
稀土提取;稀土;熔盐电解;钕铁硼磁铁废料

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The process is designed for the recovery of rare earth metals, specifically neodymium (Nd) and praseodymium (Pr), from NdFeB magnet scrap. This process is applicable in the recycling sector, targeting the extraction and production of Nd-Pr alloy, which is critical in manufacturing high-strength permanent magnets used in various advanced technological applications, such as electric motors, wind turbine generators, and hard disk drives.
该工艺旨在从钕铁硼磁铁废料中回收稀土金属，特别是钕 (Nd) 和镨 (Pr)。该过程适用于回收领域，针对提取和生产Nd-Pr合金，这在制造各种高科技应用中的高强度永磁体中至关重要，例如电动机、风力涡轮发电机和硬盘驱动器。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit of this analysis was chosen as the production of one kg Nd–Pr alloy through extraction from NdFeB magnet scrap

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The one-step recycling process to extract rare earth metals from scrap magnets is being developed on a laboratory scale at TU Delft. Nonmagnetized, uncoated magnet samples were used in the experiment. The magnets were ball milled under inert atmosphere to increase the surface area to facilitate the electrochemical reactions, and the powder was inserted into the salt bath.
代尔夫特理工大学正在实验室规模上开发一种从废磁铁中提取稀土金属的一步回收工艺。实验中使用未磁化、未涂层的磁体样品。将磁体在惰性气氛下球磨以增加表面积以促进电化学反应，并将粉末插入盐浴中。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The process is designed for the recovery of rare earth metals, specifically neodymium (Nd) and praseodymium (Pr), from NdFeB magnet scrap. This process is applicable in the recycling sector, targeting the extraction and production of Nd-Pr alloy, which is critical in manufacturing high-strength permanent magnets used in various advanced technological applications, such as electric motors, wind turbine generators, and hard disk drives.
该工艺旨在从钕铁硼磁铁废料中回收稀土金属，特别是钕 (Nd) 和镨 (Pr)。该过程适用于回收领域，针对提取和生产Nd-Pr合金，这在制造各种高科技应用中的高强度永磁体中至关重要，例如电动机、风力涡轮发电机和硬盘驱动器。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The allocation of environmental flows to Nd and Pr was updated. Value allocation was used to share the process impacts from both multi-output stages, reflecting prices from recent years (2013–2016). There are two stages in the primary production of rare earths for which assumptions regarding coproductions are necessary: the beneficiation stage, where concentrated iron ore and rare earth concentrate are separated, and the solvent extraction stage undertaken to separate individual rare earths.

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Schulze, R., Abbasalizadeh, A., Bulach, W., Schebek, L. & Buchert, M. An Ex-ante LCA Study of Rare Earth Extraction from NdFeB Magnet Scrap Using Molten Salt Electrolysis. J. Sustain. Metall. 4, 493–505 (2018).

Schulze, R., Abbasalizadeh, A., Bulach, W., Schebek, L. & Buchert, M. An Ex-ante LCA Study of Rare Earth Extraction from NdFeB Magnet Scrap Using Molten Salt Electrolysis. J. Sustain. Metall. 4, 493–505 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data, users should consider the experimental nature of the process, currently developed at a laboratory scale. Applicability for scaling up to industrial levels may require consideration of technological adaptations and efficiency changes. The updated allocation of environmental flows to Nd and Pr based on value allocation reflects the economic considerations given to byproducts during the beneficiation and solvent extraction stages. The instructions also highlight the necessity of separately modelling the allocation for multi-output stages accurately based on recent data (2013–2016). Users should ensure the functional unit—production of 1 kg Nd-Pr alloy from NdFeB magnet scrap—is consistent with the goal and scope of their assessment.
用户在使用此数据时，应考虑该过程的实验性质，目前在实验室规模上开发。考虑将其放大到工业级别可能需要考虑技术适应性和效率变化。根据价值分配更新对Nd和Pr环境流的分摊反映了在选矿和溶剂提取阶段给予副产品的经济考量。说明还强调了准确地根据最新数据（2013-2016年）单独对多产出阶段建模分配的必要性。用户应确保功能单元——从钕铁硼磁铁废料中提取生产1公斤Nd-Pr合金——与其评估的目标和范围一致。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
